scripts.create-zip: advzip --shrink-insane --iter=1000 --add dist/game.zip dist/build/index.html dist/build/s.js dist/build/r && npm run zip-info
scripts.build: npm run clear && npm run build-resources && npm run compile && npm run bundle && npm run copy-html
scripts.watch: npm run debug-mode && npm run build && tsc --watch & esbuild dist/esm/index.js --bundle --sourcemap --outfile=dist/build/s.js --watch --servedir=dist/build
scripts.build-final: npm run release-mode && npm run build && npm run create-zip
scripts.build-roadroller: npm run release-mode && npm run build && npm run apply-roadroller && npm run create-zip
